home.name: Vedant Debadwar
home.intro: I am greatly influenced by the web technologies and have good experience working with them. A Frontend focused Web Developer building the Frontend of Websites and Web Applications that leads to the success of the overall product.

about.intro: I'm Vedant Rajesh Debadwar. Final year Computer Science B.tech student studying in MGM's College Of Engineering,Nanded. I'm in Final Year B.tech Computer Science Branch.

projects.name: FinEasy - Finance Calculator
description_list: A financial calculator exclusively for Indians with the schemes available in Indian Banks, Post Office, Mutual Funds, Retirement, Income Tax, Insurance, Bonds and much more.

projects.name: VD Insta - Instagram Clone
description_list: Social networking site where you get features like follow/unfollow, send posts, like and comment on posts etc. It is currently hosted on Heroku.
I also created its android application using React Native.

projects.name: Medibot - Healthcare Chatbot
description_list: It is android application which includes chatbot which is used to get information related to diseases such as symptoms, preventive measures, transmission information, etc.
Added feature to upload user's medical report in PDF form so that user can access them whenever required.

projects.name: E-Commerce Website
description_list: Created a ecommerce website where sellers can do registration and list their producs for sell.
Buyers can signup on site. they can search products, apply filters and buy them.
Full Stack Developer - React, Angular, Node, MySQL
Responsibilities - Develop new functionality and features inline with business requirements.
Ensured performance, quality and responsiveness of application.
Built the logic for investor profile verification.
Redesigned UI and improved user experience on application
